mdRecord.dcterms:title: Memoirs of a Huguenot family / tr. and comp. from the original autobiography of the Rev. James Fontaine, and other family manuscripts; comprising an original journal of travels in Virginia, New-York, etc., in 1715 and 1716. By Ann Maury. With an appendix, containing a translation of the Edict of Nantes, the Edict of revocation, and other interesting historical documents
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Fontaine, James, 1658-1728
Fontaine, John, 1693-
France
Maury, Ann, 1803-1876
Maury, James, 1718-1769
mdRecord.dcterms:description: First published in 1838 under title: A tale of the Huguenots.
Letters of the Rev. James Maury: p. [378]-441.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Copy 1: Gift of Bennett Woods Green.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Copy 2: Gift of Robert L. Parrish.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Copy 3: Gift of Hartwell Cabell.
